extendedInfo.description: Science News-Reader app delivers articles from the great website www.ScienceDaily.com!Satisfy all you daily science needs with this simple article reader.Save the articles to read later... even with no data connection!Includes all topics found on this wonderful website including but not limited to:Health, Medicine, Mind, Brain, Space, Time, Computers, Math, and more!:: Coming Soon :: - Tablet User Interface Improvement (very much needed) - Article Filters (similar to web site) - Day/Night Mode

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Im never done learning cool things! I like how the app refreshes its content frequently, easy to use. Its the first news ticker I look at daily. 5 stars!
reviews.author: David Miles

reviews.title: For science lovers!
reviews.comment: It\'s a wonderful way to be updated with the latest scientific developments. Although I would suggest adding a link referencing to the published article to increase its integrity as a source.
reviews.author: Naty G

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Keeps my curiosity at bay with all types of great articles. Not too crazy or fancy. Just quick, efficient and exactly what i wanted
reviews.author: sebastian rivera

reviews.title: Great science trivia source!
reviews.comment: A really great starting  point for information. When I find a topic I\'m interested in it gives me a good summary to research further.
reviews.author: Alexander Dixon

reviews.title: Good content, smooth app
reviews.comment: Tried a few others and this is the only app that does what it should with no useless frills.  Delivers cutting edge science-related news in an easy to read and access format.
reviews.author: Michael Ellis

reviews.title: 5 stars & more
reviews.comment: Feed your mind with up update informations on advancements on science, health and technology . I\'m hook . But I just wish I have all the icons active on my cellphone , not all articles have pictures on it . But I still loving the app .
reviews.author: Elieza Mascardo

reviews.title: very good
reviews.comment: You are doing a great service to humanity by maintaining this website. And this application is excellent for the promotion of a scientific world view. Just love it.
reviews.author: Maitreya Maitreyan

reviews.comment: Great App, if you like Science. Only 4 stars because not a lot of video media.
reviews.author: Chris Amoroso

reviews.title: Great science news reader.
reviews.comment: Lots of science news. No bs. Readable, sharable. I like that you can change text size and save articles. Wish it had an evolutionary science specific category, but great app. Thanks for putting it together
reviews.author: JOHN KEARNEY

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does exactly what I need it to do. The latest scientific news at my fingertips whenever I should need it. I would,  however, suggest screen rotation capability. Otherwise,  it performs wonderfully within the parameters of my personal criteria.
reviews.author: Noah Mitchell

reviews.title: Good, but no copy support.
reviews.comment: Does what it needs to do. Would be nice to be able to copy text from the stories,.
reviews.author: Bruce Head

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great way to get your daily dose of science. Summary is accurate and easy to read. I enjoy it very much.
reviews.author: ahuva bergman

reviews.comment: greatest app I\'ve downloaded in a while. Great exit prompt, \"are you done learning cool things?\" I have a hard time pressing yes.
reviews.author: Joseph Dickinson

reviews.comment: Good and very intresting i like it so much plzzz trie to make such type of application..\tNice..... i like Science so much ....
reviews.author: Navin Yankanchi

reviews.title: Great app. Works great on SIII
reviews.comment: Pretty great app. Stable, up to date, easy to navigate. My only *minor* critique would be allowing for a day/ night setting instead of all black all the time.
reviews.author: Alesha S

reviews.title: Great function, lacking form
reviews.comment: Science daily is a great source of information on the web. The app makes it very convenient to view recent articles and alpha. The problem is that the app\'s aesthetics are quite poor. It scales poorly to tablets and lacks a modern style. However, it is very functional, which makes this bearable.
reviews.author: Sean Lumly

reviews.comment: Great way to learn about the latest publications; from medical to astrophysics.
reviews.author: saul rivera

reviews.title: Clean execution, lots of content
reviews.comment: Excellent use of space, quick loading, clean execution altogether, one of my favorite apps, easy to use, informative, readable by the average user, low memory usage for phone.
reviews.author: Ora Uzel

reviews.comment: Intelligent articles are far and few between. Please don\'t water down your stories and informative articles.\tExcellent articles.
reviews.author: Lauro Rodriguez
